> **注意**: 此页面尚未翻译成中文。以下内容为英文原版。

All errors in quais include properties to assist in machine-readable errors.

## Extends

- `Error`

## Extended by

- [`UnknownError`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/UnknownError)
- [`NotImplementedError`](/cn/sdk/content/interfaces/NotImplementedError)

## Type parameters

| Type parameter | Value |
| :------ | :------ |
| `T` *extends* [`ErrorCode`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ErrorCode) | [`ErrorCode`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ErrorCode) |

## Properties

| Property | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `code` | [`ErrorCode`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/ErrorCode) | The string error code. |
| `error?` | `Error` | Any related error. |
| `info?` | `Record`\<`string`, `any`\> | Additional info regarding the error that may be useful.<br /><br />This is generally helpful mostly for human-based debugging. |
| `shortMessage` | `string` | A short message describing the error, with minimal additional details. |
